text: Butholezwe Ncube (born 24 April 1992) is a Zimbabwean footballer who plays as a midfielder for AmaZulu F.C. and the Zimbabwe national football team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:AmaZulu F.C. players Category:Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League players Category:South African Premier Division players Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Zimbabwe international footballers Category:Zimbabwean expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Butholezwe Ncube
